meanings.sent1: She woke up early and went for a run prebreakfast.
meanings.sent2: I always brush my teeth prebreakfast.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily prebreakfast, welcoming the new day.
meanings.sent4: The sun peeked over the horizon prebreakfast, painting the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The quiet prebreakfast hours are my favorite time to read and relax.

meanings.definition: A meal or snack consumed before breakfast.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed a small prebreakfast of yogurt and fruit.
meanings.sent2: I usually have a quick prebreakfast before heading to work.
meanings.sent3: The cat eagerly awaited his prebreakfast treat every morning.
meanings.sent4: The prebreakfast spread at the hotel included pastries, fruits, and juices.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly brewed coffee filled the kitchen during prebreakfast preparations.
